[NOTE: IT SHOULD BE NOTED THAT THE MEN SPECIFICALLY ADDRESSED IN THESE COUNSELS WERE OLDER MEN WORKING A MULTI-LANGUAGE FIELD, AND IN THE MAIN THEIR DUTIES WERE QUITE GENERAL IN NATURE. IT WOULD BE A MISUSE TO SUGGEST THAT THESE BRIEF EXCERPTS SHOULD COUNTER THE COUNSEL GIVEN BY ELLEN WHITE AND BY CHURCH LEADERS THAT THOSE CALLED TO LABOR IN OTHER COUNTRIES SHOULD BE THOROUGH STUDENTS OF THE LANGUAGE USED IN THE AREA IN WHICH THEY WERE TO LABOR, SEEKING TO MASTER IT. 

White Estate Washington, D. C. April 2, 1980.]
